results.content: Overall, it is a great course on Hapi.js. It covers authentication, routing, database integration, test, and debug, etc. I would recommend you to take it if you are new or need to use hapi.js.

results.content: The course material is not structured properly. Eg for the lecture on creating a new server, one would expect to see details on setting up a new server, whereas, the material discussed saving user model. It seemed that this video was part of some other discussion and was randomly added for this lecture.
